clubpro

Source: vignettes/clubpro.Rmd
clubpro.Rmd
library(clubpro)
mod <- club(width ~ location, data = jellyfish)
summary(mod)
#> ********** Classification Results **********
#> Observations: 46 
#> Missing observations: 0 
#> Target groups: 2 
#> Correctly classified observations: 39 
#> Incorrectly classified observations: 7
